roleset.name: acquire industrial capacity, progress in favor of industry

role.descr: attribute of arg1 actually becoming industrialized

example.name: industrialize-v
example.text: The Chinese problem is much greater -- it's how *trace* to industrialize to begin with.''

example.name: industrialize-v
example.text: Newly industrialized countries: Singapore, Hong Kong, Taiwan, South Korea

example.name: industrialize-v
example.text: The Baiji population declined drastically in recent decades as China industrialized and made heavy use of the river for fishing.

example.name: industrialization-n: args 1 and
example.text: Thus, society in general will benefit from the economic industrialization of US hog production

example.name: industrialization-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: Second, how has their industrialization of production allowed them to consolidate this control?

roleset.note: INDUSTRIALIZE-V NOTES: No Vncls, No FN. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from industrialize.01-v)
INDUSTRIALIZATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on industrialize-v.01. No corresponding VNcls. (from industrialization.01-n)
arg0-agent and arg2-attribute added based on expected occurance, internet usage. (from industrialization.01-n)
